reviewText: the content of the dvd is not pure seti-hati however it is still useful in that you can learn the methods easily because unlike many other dvds the performer clearly explains what he is doing in detail, the methods are not many but they address the most common ways you are likely to be attacked and when you consider that it is the  principles  of the art that count you can devise your own self-tailored system suited to your needs. there are no weapon defenses or ground fighting ,this to bad it would rounded out the content niecly. the performer also explans the differance between martial arts and self-defense principles that work.
